relationships.description: Wolff is sharing political intelligence with Epstein
Trump reportedly likes the deputy crown prince and thinks they can work together

analysis.purpose: To share political intelligence about Trump's views on the deputy crown prince
analysis.significance: Shows Michael Wolff sharing insider political information with Jeffrey Epstein about Trump administration perspectives

notable_quotes: "Was with Bannon last night who was saying how much Trump liked deputy crown prince: 'Real guy's guy, he loved him. Thinks they can do stuff together.'"
red_flags: Sharing of sensitive political intelligence with Jeffrey Epstein

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff is a known author and journalist who wrote books about the Trump administration. This email shows him sharing political intelligence with Jeffrey Epstein.

analysis.summary: Michael Wolff emails Jeffrey Epstein to share that Steve Bannon reported Trump's positive impression of the deputy crown prince, describing him as a 'real guy's guy' and believing they could work together.
